name: Late For A Date
description:
Made in 4 days for the Three Button Jam

THEME: Cycle

Limitation: Only 3 buttons

You only have 15 seconds before your date starts! Pedal your way across town while keeping up your time and getting a gift for your date. Can you get the secret ending?

Music from: https://thricedotted.itch.io/looptober-2021-variety-pack
